changeSet.author: Krzysztof Kwiatkowski
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW vw_loan AS SELECT l.id, l.household, l.amount, l.annual_loan_percentage, l.bank, l.start_date, l.end_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, l.start_date, l.end_date) AS installment_count_all, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, CURDATE(), l.end_date) AS installment_count, l.installment_amount FROM loan l;
